Immediately after your baby 
is born
Every pregnant woman has milk 
ready for her baby at birth. This 
milk is called colostrum and it 
is sometimes quite yellow in 
colour. It is very concentrated, 
so your baby only needs a small 
amount	at	each	feed.	In	the	first
